entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 7:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: NE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers except a few flurries over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early in the afternoon then clearing. A few flurries over higher terrain in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
